blocks.content_html:
Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Plugins > ChaosClothAsset

Classes

  Type Name Description
FClothGeometryTools Geometry tools operating on cloth collections.  
FCollectionClothConstFacade Cloth Asset collection facade class focused on draping and pattern information.  
FCollectionClothFabricConstFacade Cloth Asset collection fabric facade class to access cloth fabric data.  
FCollectionClothFabricFacade Cloth Asset collection fabric facade class to access cloth fabric data.  
FCollectionClothFacade Cloth Asset collection facade class focused on draping and pattern information.  
FCollectionClothRenderPatternConstFacade Cloth Asset collection render pattern facade class to access cloth render pattern data.  
FCollectionClothRenderPatternFacade Cloth Asset collection render pattern facade class to access cloth render pattern data.  
FCollectionClothSeamConstFacade Cloth Asset collection seam facade class to access cloth seam data.  
FCollectionClothSeamFacade Cloth Asset collection seam facade class to access cloth seam data.  
FCollectionClothSelectionConstFacade Cloth Asset collection Selection facade class.  
FCollectionClothSelectionFacade Cloth Asset collection Selection facade class.  
FCollectionClothSimPatternConstFacade Cloth Asset collection sim pattern facade class to access cloth sim pattern data.  
FCollectionClothSimPatternFacade Cloth Asset collection sim pattern facade class to access cloth sim pattern data.  
FDefaultFabric    
FDefaultSolver    
TIsIndexType Integral and vector types valid as index type in initializations.  
TIsUserAttributeType User defined attribute types.

Variables

  Type Name Description
const FName Fabrics Contains all the fabrics simulation parameters used by the sim patterns .
const FName Lods LOD information (only one LOD per collection).
const FName RenderFaces Contains indices to render vertex.
const FName RenderPatterns Contains render pattern relationships to other groups.
const FName RenderVertices Contains 3D render model.
const FName Seams Collection of seam stitches.
const FName SeamStitches Contains pairs of stitched sim vertex indices.
const FName SimFaces Contains indices to sim vertices.
const FName SimPatterns Contains sim pattern relationships to other groups.
const FName SimVertices2D Contains 2D positions.
const FName SimVertices3D Contains 3D positions.
const FName Solvers Solvers information (only one Solver per collection for now).
